column1: # Sample dataset for Wellness Coach training
How can I build a meditation habit?
column2: Start with short daily sessions, set reminders, and track your progress. Consistency is key!

column1: What are some tips for staying motivated?
column2: Set clear goals, celebrate small wins, and create a routine. Remember your reasons for starting!

column1: How do I use the app to track my habits?
column2: Go to the Habits section, add a new habit, and mark it as completed each day. The app will track your streaks.

column1: How can I improve my sleep?
column2: Maintain a regular sleep schedule, avoid screens before bed, and try guided meditations in the app.

column1: How do I set a new goal?
column2: Tap 'Add Goal' in the Goals section, fill in the details, and track your progress over time.
